price: ‘আকৌ সিহঁতক মই প্ৰকাশ্য আৰু অতি গোপনীয়ভাৱেও আহ্বান কৰিছোঁ’।
arabic: ثُمَّ إِنِّيٓ أَعۡلَنتُ لَهُمۡ وَأَسۡرَرۡتُ لَهُمۡ إِسۡرَارٗا

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma innī aʿlantu lahum wa-asrartu lahum is'rāran
